tutorialSteps.topText: Merging two small Blobs together makes a big Blob that is the color of the Blob you swipe.
tutorialSteps.bottomText: Try merging the red Blob onto the one below it.

tutorialSteps.topText: Big Blobs can also be merged onto smaller ones, taking the small Blob’s place.
tutorialSteps.bottomText: Try swiping that red Blob onto the pink one.

tutorialSteps.topText: See that flag pole? That’s a Flag Blob. In addition to Target Tiles, Flag Blobs can also lead to a win as long as there are no other Blobs on the board.
tutorialSteps.bottomText: You can remove any sized Blob from the board by merging it onto a Flag Blob… But, make sure the Blob you swipe is the same color as the flag. Try it!
